Line.Description: Zell - Esslingen (N) ZOB - Weil - Mettingen Mettingen - Weil - Esslingen (N) ZOB - Zell

FareStructureElement.Name: Conditions of Travel
FareStructureElement.Description: From the moment of purchase, the Single Ticket is valid for 3 hours for a journey in the direction of the destination. Change of vehicles and interruption of the journey are permitted, round and return trips are not permitted.

GenericParameterAssignment.Name: Rule for using bahn
GenericParameterAssignment.Description: S-Bahn and regional trains: valid for a journey to the next (=1) station..

GenericParameterAssignment.Name: Rule for using bus
GenericParameterAssignment.Description: City railway/bus: valid for a journey without change of vehicles or interruption up to 3 stations after boarding.

FareStructureElement.Name: Conditions of Travel
FareStructureElement.Description: In determining possible destinations covered by the Short-Distance Ticket, stops travelled through are counted as part of the journey. Short-Distance Tickets are valid for journeys of 5 km at most. Starting from the station indicated on the ticket, the Short-Distance Ticket entitles its holder to a journey in the destination’s direction without change of vehicles or interruption. The journey must be started immediately. Journeys that are excluded on account of length are indicated on timetables and notice boards.

GroupTicket.Name: Group
GroupTicket.Description: From the moment of purchase or validation, the Group Day Ticket is valid for up to five persons (irrespective of age) or for parents/one parent with any number of their own children up to and including the age of 17, until 7 am on the following day. .

RoundTrip.Name: Valid for an unlimited number of journeys within the selected fare zones.

UsageValidityPeriod.Description: From the moment of purchase or validation, the Day Ticket is valid for one person until 7 am on the following day.
